snippet: A new points system was put into place to set the field for the Kentucky Derby and Oaks.
abstract: New points system is put into place to set the field for the 2013 Kentucky Derby and Kentucky Oaks; hopefuls can start accumulating points as 2-year-olds, but the greatest number of points will be awarded for the traditional prep races.
lead_paragraph: A new points system was put into place to set the field for the Kentucky Derby and Oaks.

headline.seo: Points Race Will Set Derby Field
headline.main: Points Race Will Set Derby Field
headline.print_headline: Points Race Will Set Derby Field
